{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Meru Networks |model=AP310 |revision= |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=USI |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/15/2007 |fcc_id=RE7-AP300 |ic_id=6749A-AP300 |type=managed access point |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=MPC8347E;MPC8347EVVAJFB; |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128N90TFIR2 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QE-ZCE6 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=USI MP-N-AT-02 rev 1.1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5416 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5133 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8601XKN |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth=00:0C:E6 }}
"MERU TRISULI DVT2.0" is silkscreened on the board.
This device is using a... *[[Freescale]] MPC8347E ("MPC8347EVVAJFB", "533/333MHz", "QMZNL0738", "MALAYSIA")
This AP (and other ''Meru Networks'' APs) are designed to be used with a centralized AP controller.
